summary: A comprehensive pytest test suite for the airbrake control system, including shared fixtures, unit tests for context and main orchestration modules, integration tests with historic telemetry, and utility function verification, all aimed at validating state transitions, telemetry processing, hardware interaction, and command-line parsing.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, robustness, and performance of the flight software components by detecting regressions, ensuring proper behavior across simulated and real hardware environments, and providing confidence in the system's operational readiness.
